items.text:
For the last hour, the ground under your feet has been growing
soggier. The rich scent of loam and decay fills your nose. Finally, you
walk under a corridor of arching boughs draped with hanging moss
and find yourself standing on a narrow spit of dry land leading into a
morass of black water, vines, and cypress trees. You’ve found a path
that leads to the Marsh of Rebirth.
